attributes.action: Rethink the crazy idea employing smoking officers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we need these people, the whole smoking ban will police itself. I speak as a smoker, I wouldnt dream of smoking in no smoking areas, and I am sure other people feel the same. Please use the money for something useful, you crazy man.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
